text: What are the best and worst emacs key bindings in development software?
Ever since I learned it, I find myself trying to use C-p and C-n to move up and down in everything that has a text box on it.
I'm perpetually annoyed by software that has an emacs mode that's pretty obviously either put together by someone who's never used emacs before or it's done in a crappy manner.
So let's recognize the winners and losers in this thread.
